Plot: A university professor and a team of students conduct an experiment on a young woman, uncovering terrifyingly dark, unexpected forces in the process.
Title: The Quiet Ones
Writer: Craig Rosenberg (screenplay), Oren Moverman (screenplay), John Pogue (screenplay), Tom de Ville (based on the screenplay by)
Actors: Jared Harris, Sam Claflin, Erin Richards, Rory Fleck-Byrne
tomatoConsensus: While it definitely sports a few palpable scares, The Quiet Ones finds Hammer Films trading too heavily on past glories.
